summary:
Adds Soul Gems and other Soul Items to be crafted.
Adds a guide on how to-with custom scripts
Adds custom Soul-Gem models
descriptionHtml:
Ever needed Soul Gems to recharge your weapon or use in a soul trap? Well now you can!

This mod adds a new branch to the smithing skill tree called Soul Gem Smithing, after you aquire this skill you can craft EMPTY Soul Gems at the forge!

Go to the smelter by in Whiterun, where Adrianna Avenicci sells her goods, there you will find a stand with a guide to the mod on it!

This is a work in progress and will be balanced and added onto as time passes so be patient! If you want something changed or added please comment about it and your wish is my command on this!

Also included is a special soul capturing weapon!
Planning to add more and custom textures and models too!

Currently Craftable:
__
Black Soul Gem(Empty) 

- *REQUIRES* - 
2 Small Antlers | 2 Leather 
*OR*
1 Large Antler | 2 Leather
=======================================
Soul Quartz (Based off Grand Soul Gem)
- *REQUIRES* - 
2 Small Antlers | 1 Leather
*OR*
1 Large Antler | 1 Leather

Soul Bow
- *REQUIRES* -
4 individual reciepes as I am having trouble incorporating the gems, check the forge :)
__
If you want these recipes changed or things added please ask!
Changed the recipe, just temp, will fix it all soon!

Added 1 custom model so far!
